description: Rafael Carreras fucks Rico Romero in the ass bareback: If there is a power professional more than capable of taking a young and budding wunderkind under his wing, it’s Rafael Carreras. A few years ago he showed his prowess on a Canadian business trip where he took control of Scott Carter in his hotel room and slammed him in the ass. Rafael returns now and Rico Romero is his white-collar prey. Rico is young and talented, but a bit of guidance is still needed. And if you check out 22:00 you’ll see that Rico isn’t used to taking such a huge and raw uncut cock up his ass, but pleasing the boss is his utmost priority.
title: Rafael Carreras Fucks Rico Romero In The Ass Bareback
